Text: After the war, sales took off again with the era of package holidays. By 1950, more than a million Britons were travelling abroad each year, mainly to France, Italy, Spain and Switzerland.
Cause: After the war, sales took off again with the era of package holidays.
Effect: By 1950, more than a million Britons were travelling abroad each year, mainly to France, Italy, Spain and Switzerland.
Sentence: <e1>After the war, sales took off again with the era of package holidays.</e1> <e2>By 1950, more than a million Britons were travelling abroad each year, mainly to France, Italy, Spain and Switzerland.</e2>
